description:
Ultralight trail shoes that let you cruise away from the crowds, with a waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® membrane for protection on soggy days. The synthetic, lightweight upper's seamless construction makes chafing a thing of the past. A lightweight energy plate adds support to the midsole, and a sticky sole keeps you sure-footed on uneven terrain.

  • Seamless synthetic uppers have welded overlays for durability
  • Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® membrane let you tackle wet conditions
  • Reverse camber helps maintain a natural stride
  • Protective rubber toecap adds toe protection
  • Sensifit™ construction provides a precise, secure fit
  • Removable OrthoLite® EVA footbeds make 15km feel like 5km
  • Injected EVA midsoles combine cushioning and support
  • TPU Energy Blade plate protects the forefoot from intrusions
  • Outsoles are non-marking Contagrip® rubber
name: Salomon OUTpulse Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
